import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react';
import { View, Text, TextInput, StyleSheet } from 'react-native';

import Swiper from 'react-native-web-swiper';

const score = [
    {
        id: '1',
        heading: `Calculate Your Self-Worth`,
        summary: [
            `I behave the way others expect me to so that they will like me.`,
            `I don’t think I’m on equal grounds with others and have difficulties developing positive relationships.`,
            `I rarely trust myself nor feel strong enough to handle things on my own.`,
            `I don’t take compliments very well because I think the person isn’t being truthful.`,
            `I am afraid of being judged by others.`,
            `I often feel inferior to others.`,
            `I let other people set the standards for my life.`,
            `I find it hard to forgive myself for making mistakes.`,
            `I feel a sense of failure when my grades are lower than those of my peers.`,
            `I wish I was more like other people—I feel so different.`,
        ],
    },
]

const Chat = () => {

    const [form, setForm] = useState({
        question1:'',
        question2:'',
        question3:'',
        question4:'',
        question5:'',
        question6:'',
        question7:'',
        question8:'',
        question9:'',
        question10:'',
    });

    const total = form.question1; 

    return (
        <View style={styles.radioForm}>
            <View>
                <Text style={styles.paragraph}>{slide.summary[0]}</Text>


                <Text>Enter Score 1-5</Text>
                <TextInput onChange={setForm.question1} placeholder="score 1-5" keyboardType="numeric" />

            </View>
            <View>
                <Text style={styles.paragraph}>{slide.summary[1]}</Text>


                <Text>Enter Score 1-5</Text>
                <TextInput onChange={setForm.question2} placeholder="score 1-5" keyboardType="numeric" />
            </View>
            <View>
                <Text style={styles.paragraph}>{slide.summary[2]}</Text>


                <Text>Enter Score 1-5</Text>
                <TextInput onChange={setForm.question3} placeholder="score 1-5" keyboardType="numeric" />
            </View>
            <View>
                <Text style={styles.paragraph}>{slide.summary[3]}</Text>

                <Text>Enter Score 1-5</Text>
                <TextInput onChange={setForm.question4} placeholder="score 1-5" keyboardType="numeric" />
            </View>
            <View>
                <Text style={styles.paragraph}>{slide.summary[4]}</Text>

                <Text>Enter Score 1-5</Text>
                <TextInput onChange={setForm.question5} placeholder="score 1-5" keyboardType="numeric" />
            </View>
            <View>
                <Text style={styles.paragraph}>{slide.summary[5]}</Text>


                <Text>Enter Score 1-5</Text>
                <TextInput onChange={setForm.question6} placeholder="score 1-5" keyboardType="numeric" />
            </View>
            <View>
                <Text style={styles.paragraph}>{slide.summary[6]}</Text>

                <Text>Enter Score 1-5</Text>
                <TextInput onChange={setForm.question7} placeholder="score 1-5" keyboardType="numeric" />
            </View>
            <View>
                <Text style={styles.paragraph}>{slide.summary[7]}</Text>


                <Text>Enter Score 1-5</Text>
                <TextInput onChange={setForm.question8} placeholder="score 1-5" keyboardType="numeric" />
            </View>
            <View>
                <Text style={styles.paragraph}>{slide.summary[8]}</Text>

                <Text>Enter Score 1-5</Text>
                <TextInput onChange={setForm.question9} placeholder="score 1-5" keyboardType="numeric" />
            </View>
            <View>
                <Text style={styles.paragraph}>{slide.summary[9]}</Text>

                <Text>Enter Score 1-5</Text>
                <TextInput onChange={setForm.question10} placeholder="score 1-5" keyboardType="numeric" />
            </View>
            <Text>Your total: {total}</Text>
        </View>
    )
};

const styles = StyleSheet.create({});

export default Chat;
